    • accounts

      public List<PublicKey> accounts(List<AddressLookupTable> addressLookupTables) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Description copied from interface: MessageVisitor.V0InstructionView
      Returns the list of accounts for the instruction, using the address lookup tables to map the indexes stored in the message to actual addresses
      Specified by:
      accounts in interface MessageVisitor.V0InstructionView
      Parameters:
      addressLookupTables - the list of address lookup tables
      Returns:
      a list of PublicKey objects representing the accounts
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the address lookup tables provided do not map to any of the lookup accounts in the message

    • data

      public ByteBuffer data()
      Description copied from interface: MessageVisitor.InstructionView
      Returns the instruction data as a byte buffer.

      The buffer's position will be set to 0, its limit will be set to its capacity, and its capacity will be the size of the data in bytes.

      Specified by:
      data in interface MessageVisitor.InstructionView
      Returns:
      the instruction data as a ByteBuffer
